name: Tellah's Tower
description:
How to Play:

Climb Tellah's tower and conquer the adventure you build along the way. Defeat all enemies on a floor to open two portals to the next floor. Above each of the portals will be an enemy or trap, the displayed enemy will be added/multiplied on the next floor! Every portal you go through adds more difficulty of your choice, beware, things can get out of hand pretty quickly!

1. Kill All Enemies

2. Choose a Portal at the top of the screen

3. Climb!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Space Bar to Attack

Hint: Hit them with the hammer, not your fist!

Font Used: https://www.dafont.com/capitalis-typoasis.font
